title: How to Make Perfetto Nicciole

steps.headline: Boil Macaroni in water according to the amount you want for yourself.
steps.description: Mostly it takes 10-15 minutes to get boiled (for a cup of Macaroni).

steps.headline: After boiling Macaroni, drain the water and keep it aside.
Now take a frying pan and add a little oil to it.
steps.description: Now add half spoon of turmeric powder, one spoon of chilli powder (you can add more if you want it more spicy). Add one Maggi Chicken stock (you can add salt if you don't have one) and wait until everything gets mixed together, the maggi chicken stock should melt. Add a half cup of tomato paste and one-fourth cup of onion paste to it and mix well.

steps.headline: (Optional) If you want you can add small sliced carrots, zucchini and long green beans.
After all these gets cooked together, add the boiled Macaroni to it and mix it together properly.
Add to a bowl or plate and serve.
steps.description: Perfetto Nicciole is ready to eat!

text: Boil Macaroni in water according to the amount you want for yourself. Mostly it takes 10-15 minutes to get boiled (for a cup of Macaroni). After boiling Macaroni, drain the water and keep it aside.  Now take a frying pan and add a little oil to it. Now add half spoon of turmeric powder, one spoon of chilli powder (you can add more if you want it more spicy). Add one Maggi Chicken stock (you can add salt if you don't have one) and wait until everything gets mixed together, the maggi chicken stock should melt. Add a half cup of tomato paste and one-fourth cup of onion paste to it and mix well. (Optional) If you want you can add small sliced carrots, zucchini and long green beans.  After all these gets cooked together, add the boiled Macaroni to it and mix it together properly.  Add to a bowl or plate and serve. Perfetto Nicciole is ready to eat!
